1221070.name: Alien street battle
1221070.description:
Alien Street Battle is an action-packed, mission-based game where you fight to save the city from a full-scale alien invasion—while keeping your sense of humor intact. As the city’s last line of defense, you’ll take on daring missions, battle waves of extraterrestrial enemies, and navigate the chaos of an urban warzone.

Armed with an ever-expanding arsenal, you’ll clear out alien strongholds, rescue stranded civilians, and take down towering bosses—all while dealing with clueless bystanders, malfunctioning gear, and teammates who may or may not know what they’re doing. The stakes are high, but that doesn’t mean there isn’t time for a few one-liners and some accidental property damage.
1221070.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
